article: brazilian state-owned oil company petrobras and its bolivian counterpart ypfb , will sign a memorandum of understanding for future cooperation by the end of february , the brazilian company said in a statement on friday .
abstract: brazil bolivia to sign memorandum on oil gas cooperation
